ModInfo.Name: Unlock Everything
ModInfo.Author: Sheepy
ModInfo.Description:
This mod unlocks all weapons, armours, and equipments in the vanilla game, intended as a test platform for other mods.
Aircrafts and vehicles are enabled immediately after Alien Invasion, and takes only 1 credit + 1 man day to produce. Each hanger also accomodates one vechile, to allow vehicle when starting a new game.
I can't seem to unlock advanced buildings. If you know how please let me know.
This mod is limited to X:CE. It supports Armored Assault and should be placed above it, but does not depend on it.
Mod home: https://github.com/Sheep-y/xenonauts-mods
